DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Meilisearch health check is disabled or not.

Endpoint.description: The endpoint URI string of the Meilisearch server to connect to.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets a integer value that indicates the Meilisearch health check timeout in milliseconds.

MasterKey.description: The Master Key of the Meilisearch server to connect to.

Client.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a Meilisearch server using MeilisearchClient.
